## Letter type

Represents a letter (uppercase or lowercase).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type Letter = UppercaseLetter | Lowercase<UppercaseLetter>;
```
**References:** [UppercaseLetter](./react.uppercaseletter.md)
